previous.name: Grounds for Laziness and Arousing Energy

segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 8
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 8

segments.pli: 9. Sativagga
segments.en: 9. Mindfulness

segments.pli: 81. Satisampajaññasutta
segments.en: 81. Mindfulness and Situational Awareness

segments.pli: “Satisampajaññe, bhikkhave, asati satisampajaññavipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti hirottappaṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, when there is no mindfulness and situational awareness, one who lacks mindfulness and situational awareness has destroyed a vital condition for conscience and prudence.

segments.pli: Hirottappe asati hirottappavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti indriyasaṃvaro.
segments.en: When there is no conscience and prudence, one who lacks conscience and prudence has destroyed a vital condition for sense restraint.

segments.pli: Indriyasaṃvare asati indriyasaṃvaravipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti sīlaṃ.
segments.en: When there is no sense restraint, one who lacks sense restraint has destroyed a vital condition for ethical conduct.

segments.pli: Sīle asati sīlavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti sammāsamādhi.
segments.en: When there is no ethical conduct, one who lacks ethics has destroyed a vital condition for right immersion.

segments.pli: Sammāsamādhimhi asati sammāsamādhivipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ.
segments.en: When there is no right immersion, one who lacks right immersion has destroyed a vital condition for true knowledge and vision.

segments.pli: Yathābhūtañāṇadassane asati yathābhūtañāṇadassanavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti nibbidāvirāgo.
segments.en: When there is no true knowledge and vision, one who lacks true knowledge and vision has destroyed a vital condition for disillusionment and dispassion.

segments.pli: Nibbidāvirāge asati nibbidāvirāgavipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ.
segments.en: When there is no disillusionment and dispassion, one who lacks disillusionment and dispassion has destroyed a vital condition for knowledge and vision of freedom.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, rukkho sākhāpalāsavipanno. Tassa papaṭikāpi na pāripūriṃ gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … sāropi na pāripūriṃ gacchati.
segments.en: Suppose there was a tree that lacked branches and foliage. Its shoots, bark, softwood, and heartwood would not grow to fullness.

segments.pli: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, satisampajaññe asati satisampajaññavipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti hirottappaṃ;
segments.en: In the same way, when there is no mindfulness and situational awareness, one who lacks mindfulness and situational awareness has destroyed a vital condition for conscience and prudence.

segments.pli: hirottappe asati hirottappavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti … pe …
segments.en: When there is no conscience and prudence …

segments.pli: vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ.
segments.en: One who lacks disillusionment and dispassion has destroyed a vital condition for knowledge and vision of freedom.

segments.pli: Satisampajaññe, bhikkhave, sati satisampajaññasampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti hirottappaṃ.
segments.en: When there is mindfulness and situational awareness, one who has fulfilled mindfulness and situational awareness has fulfilled a vital condition for conscience and prudence.

segments.pli: Hirottappe sati hirottappasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti indriyasaṃvaro.
segments.en: When there is conscience and prudence, a person who has fulfilled conscience and prudence has fulfilled a vital condition for sense restraint.

segments.pli: Indriyasaṃvare sati indriyasaṃvarasampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti sīlaṃ.
segments.en: When there is sense restraint, one who has sense restraint has fulfilled a vital condition for ethical conduct.

segments.pli: Sīle sati sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammāsamādhi.
segments.en: When there is ethical conduct, one who has fulfilled ethical conduct has fulfilled a vital condition for right immersion.

segments.pli: Sammāsamādhimhi sati sammāsamādhisampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ.
segments.en: When there is right immersion, one who has fulfilled right immersion has fulfilled a vital condition for true knowledge and vision.

segments.pli: Yathābhūtañāṇadassane sati yathābhūtañāṇadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidāvirāgo.
segments.en: When there is true knowledge and vision, one who has fulfilled true knowledge and vision has fulfilled a vital condition for disillusionment and dispassion.

segments.pli: Nibbidāvirāge sati nibbidāvirāgasampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ.
segments.en: When there is disillusionment and dispassion, one who has fulfilled disillusionment and dispassion has fulfilled a vital condition for knowledge and vision of freedom.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, rukkho sākhāpalāsasampanno. Tassa papaṭikāpi pāripūriṃ gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … sāropi pāripūriṃ gacchati.
segments.en: Suppose there was a tree that was complete with branches and foliage. Its shoots, bark, softwood, and heartwood would grow to fullness.

segments.pli: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, satisampajaññe sati satisampajaññasampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti hirottappaṃ;
segments.en: In the same way, when there is mindfulness and situational awareness, one who has fulfilled mindfulness and situational awareness has fulfilled a vital condition for conscience and prudence.

segments.pli: hirottappe sati hirottappasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti … pe …
segments.en: When there is conscience and prudence …

segments.pli: vimuttiñāṇadassanan”ti.
segments.en: One who has fulfilled disillusionment and dispassion has fulfilled a vital condition for knowledge and vision of freedom.”

segments.pli: Paṭhamaṃ.
